entry.title: TAPLEAF_UPDATE_VERIFY covenant opcode
entry.summary: The conversation discusses the design and implementation of a specific set of capabilities for off-chain contract transactions. The proposed capabilities include splitting funds between multiple parties and allowing for selective withdrawals based on time or other conditions. The conversation also explores the use of various opcodes to achieve these capabilities, with some concern about potential security risks related to time-sensitive outputs and the need for relative timelocks. Ultimately, the discussion proposes a solution that involves a specific tapscript structure and includes deletions of spent pairs to prevent replay attacks. Overall, the conversation demonstrates a deep understanding of the technical complexities involved in designing and implementing off-chain contract transactions.
